Title: Directs the commissioner of education to develop curriculum for firearm safety classes in schools and provides for schools to be able to provide firearm safety instruction
Summary: Directs the commissioner of education to develop curriculum for firearm safety classes in schools; provides for schools to be able to provide firearm safety instruction which can be used to obtain a hunting license.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to directing the commissioner of education to develop curriculum for firearm safety instruction in schools and provides for schools to be able to provide firearm safety instruction
